author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
This October is MachineGames’ 15-year anniversary and this update is our anniversary gift for all players of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™.

The update contains three main additions that have climbed high on the community’s wish list: New Game+, the iconic Cairo outfit, and voice language select.

Winner of over 80 awards and awarded D.I.C.E “Adventure Game of the Year”, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle delivers an immersive experience that allows you to step into the boots of the renowned archaeologist. #indianajones 


ESRB RATING: Teen with Violence, Blood and gore, Mild language, Drug reference
title: Mix and match voice and text languages in #IndianaJones and the Great Circle with the latest update!
